name: Chisholm Private Capital Partners
overview: Chisholm Private Capital Partners, LC is no longer investing. The firm is a venture capital firm specializing in investments in early stage companies. It also makes mezzanine investments. The firm does not invest in life style businesses and in non-United States based companies. It seeks to invest 75 percent of its capital in companies based in Oklahoma and 25 percent in companies based outside of Oklahoma. The firm typically invests between $1 million and $5 million in a company, normally in stages. In case of mezzanine investing, it invests between $2 million and $4 million. The firm invests in minority interest in the form of subordinate notes with warrants or preferred stock. It can also co-invest in larger mezzanine investments. The firm generally exits its investments within five years. It normally takes 20 percent to 50 percent of the amount invested. The firm seeks to be a lead investor and prefers to take a board seat in its portfolio companies. Chisholm Private Capital Partners, LC was founded in 1996 and is based in Oklahoma City, Oklahoma with additional offices in Tulsa, Oklahoma and Richardson, Texas.
